wikipedia_page.main: Frank Osmond Carr (23 April 1858 – 29 August 1916), known as F. Osmond Carr, was an English composer who wrote the music for several Victorian burlesques before turning to the new genere of Edwardian musical comedy, and also composing some comic operas.  He often worked with the lyricist Adrian Ross, and several of his pieces were created for the producer George Edwardes.
